caption.title: Predicted number of pine dwelling forest birds (a) currently; (b) in 2050 considering climate change (MRI-CGCM3 global change model, RCP4.5) and current management; and (c) in 2050 considering climate change (MRI-CGCM3 global change model, RCP4.5) and naturalization (restriction to approximately 55% natural forests per UTM-cell and the conversion of eucalyptus plantations into pine forests).
caption.p: Grey: < 18 pine dwelling forest birds; dark grey: 18â€“25 pine dwelling forest birds; black: > 25 pine dwelling forest birds.
